DOC.HEADLINE: ATP World Tour Farmers Classic Results

TEXT.P: Results Monday from the Farmers Classic, a $700,000 ATP event played on outdoor hard courts at Los Angeles Tennis Stadium at the University of California, Los Angeles
Rainer Schuettler, Germany, def. Horacio Zeballos (7), Argentina, 6-3, 3-0, retired.
Ernests Gulbis (5), Latvia, def. Lukas Lacko, Slovakia, 7-5, 7-5.
Janko Tipsaveric (6), Serbia, def. Santiago Giraldo, Colombia, 6-1, 6-0.
